about_the_game:
Add SUPER STREET FIGHTER IITURBO to your Capcom Arcade Stadium game line-up!

Sixteen fighters in their prime gather to answer one question: who is the strongest? With new super combos and lightning-fast turbo speed, the fight takes on new heights!

Players: 1-2 Player VS
Genre: Fighting
Versions: Japanese & English
detailed_description:
Add SUPER STREET FIGHTER IITURBO to your Capcom Arcade Stadium game line-up!

Sixteen fighters in their prime gather to answer one question: who is the strongest? With new super combos and lightning-fast turbo speed, the fight takes on new heights!

Players: 1-2 Player VS
Genre: Fighting
Versions: Japanese & English
name: Capcom Arcade Stadium：Super Street Fighter II Turbo

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: Capcom Arcade Stadium：Super Street Fighter II Turbo - $1.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy Capcom Arcade Stadium：Super Street Fighter II Turbo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460 or AMD FX™-6300 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hardware specification target 720P/60FPS. *Xinput support Controllers recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770 or AMD FX™-9590 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480 with 3GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hardware specification target 1080P/60FPS. *Xinput support Controllers recommended

dejus.descriptors: Violence, Sexual Content, Legal Drugs, In-Game Purchases

supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Thai, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean
